A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Good things about this movie:
- Some of the best special effects ever seen
- Best battles of the entire franchise
- Aesthetically pleasing film
- Some good actors

Bad things about this movie:
- Some bad actors
- Terrible character writing
- Dropped several plot points from the previous film in a very anticlimactic way
- The humor falls flat more often than not
- Some scenes that are supposed to be serious end up being hilarious for all the wrong reasons
- Plot is bad and ridden with holes
